runs.comm: good start for India, a shortish ball is carved past Dilshan at backward point at four
much closer to offstump this time, Karthik defends towards gully
Gambhir looks to get off the mark with his favourite tap towards point, but he can't beat the fielder
gets his firs runs by swinging towards midwicket, into the wind and towards the long boundary, batsmen have time to get three
into middle and leg, blocked back towards the bowler
short of a length and outside off, crunched off the front foot towards cover
back of a length and into offstump, off the thigh pad towards short fine
opens the face to guide the ball from offstump towards third man
tips the ball with soft hands towards backward point
Perera grunting here with every ball he bowls, Gambhir steers this one towards third man for a single
keeps pegging away outside off, stabbed towards point
a good start for Perera, ends with another delivery outside off, hit with more power but can't beat cover
dropped by Sangakkara, who is standing up to the stumps, Gambhir made room to play a ball on middle stump, thick top-edge which Sanga can't hang on to
squeezed towards square leg for a single
Karthik does walk down the track this time and whips it over wide mid-on for four
delicately done by Karthik, stays on the backfoot and opens the face to steer it to third man

full and just outside off, Gambhir swings it in the air towards midwicket, there's a fielder in the deep and he has sprint to his right to field that one, Gambhir was ambling between the wickets as he thought it would go for four
backs away and looks to cut, but misses the ball which sails over the stumps
Karthik charges out of the track and flat bats a short of length ball towards mid-off, not too well timed
just a bit of width for Gambhir, he is so strong playing around point, chops this in front of backward point for four
a lovely drive this time, fullish ball outside off, gets it through extra cover, again Gambhir thinks its going for four and takes it easy running between wickets, gets only two for his efforts
jumps and pushes the ball towards cover for a single
length ball on the pads, flicked towards midwicket
shortish ball, perhaps the first time the short ball has been used today, Gambhir goes for the pull, doesn't connect well, ball rolls towards short fine leg
a rare length ball to start, Gambhir waltzes down the track looking to smash down the ground, gets an outside edge towards third man

Malinga has done what his captain brought him in for, gets rid of Karthik, an overpitched ball is chipped back to the bowler, looking to play to the leg side but ends up getting it to the left of the bowler, soft dismissal
shortish ball first up for Raina, gets on his toes and defends towards the leg side
a bit of width, steered towards short third man for a single to get off the mark
shortish ball and outside off, Gambhir slaps it towards point, the field is packed there
bouncer to finish, Gambhir looks to upper cut that one, gets it fine past the keeper, the ball just lands inside the rope
short ball, Raina takes his eyes off as he plays that one awkwardly, helps it along to backward square leg
slanting into the pads this time, gets a bit of an inside-edge as he looks to thrash the ball towards midwicket, it races past short fine leg for four
lovely shot from Raina, gets well forward and drive a fullish wide ball through extra cover
very wide outside off, Thushara will have to re-bowl that one
Raina gets his second boundary of the over, just short of length and outside off, Raina clobbers it over the bowler for four
super shot from Raina, full and on middle and off, flicks it wide of midwicket in the circle and the man at long-on, timing was supreme on that shot
inside-edge onto the pads to end the over, ball rolls back down the pitch
length ball on the pads, tucked in front of square leg for a single
Raina has started well here, he gets another boundary, this was a poor delivery, outside leg stump, glanced fine for four
ugly from Raina, shortish ball angling across him, Raina charges out of the crease and looks to swipe it towards midwicket, misses
another short ball, pulled behind square leg this time, no-balled as it is the second bouncer of the over
another poor delivery, outside leg stump, glanced to the fine leg boundary by Gambhir
more legstump offerings, clipped towards square leg
full ball outside off, punched towards mid-off
angling into offstump, defended off the backfoot
tossed up this time, on middle stump, tucked towards midwicket
on the pads again, Gambhir rocks back and clips it towards midwicket, batsmen zip through for two
comes down the track and plays it in the air towards sweeper cover
sliding onto legstump again, turned to short fine leg for a single
on middle stump this time, again Gambhir gets on the backfoot and whips it towards midwicket, the bowler has to dash across to do the fielding
fullish and just outside off, 'two, two' is the call from Gambhir as soon as he pushes the ball towards wide long-on
full and following Gambhir who was looking to make room, clipped to midwicket for a single
keeps it full, outside off this time, punched along the ground to long-off for a single
again Gambhir calls for two, immediately after he pushes the ball towards long-on, the straight boundaries are 80 yards long here
down the leg side
leans forward and tucks the ball towards midwicket, slightly quiet period of play here
cracks it uppishly towards long-off for a single that brings up the 50 partnership
Randiv starts with a legstump ball, tucked in front of square leg

the ball rolling off Gambhir's thigh pads, and goes dangerous close to the stumps before stopping dead, Gambhir is extremely lucky to survive, called a 'wide' by the umpire, Sangakkara lets him know that it hits Gambhir  thigh pad and just stayed there
whipped wide of square leg for a single
down the track and punched towards long-on for an easy single
on the pads again, clipped to square leg for a single
bends his knee and sweeps it fine past Jayasuriya at short fine leg for four
tucked to deep square leg for one more
eased down to long-on for a single
rocks back and swings it towards deep midwicket
opens the face to guide it past point for one more
strange piece of cricket, Gambhir backs away way down leg side, and doesn't play a stroke, the ball goes through between him and legstump
tucked to short fine leg for a quick single
a bit of turn there gives Gambhir room to free his arms, cut towards point
and again, he gets the breakthrough early, a short of length ball, Gambhir looks to dab it past the keeper, only manages to get it as far as Sangakkara
back of length again, pushed off the backfoot towards extra cover for a single
a superb yorker, on middle stump from Malinga, Raina squeezes it out to the leg side
slightly short of being a yorker, outside off and defended towards mid-off
length ball on off, Raina checks his shot as he looks ot play down the ground, gets the ball towards long-off
the slower bouncer to round off the over, Dhoni looks to help it along to square leg but is beaten by the change of pace
he starts with one outside leg, paddled towards fine leg for a couple
shifts his line to offstump, eased down to long-off for a single
Dhoni shuffles down the track and slugs a length ball over wide mid-on for the first six of the match
makes rooms and cuts it towards deep point for two this time
again width on offer, this time Dhoni calls 'one' as he plays it towards the fielder in front of point
almost a yorker there, blocked back to the bowler
on the legstump again, tipped to the right of the bowler and a quick single is taken
and that is into the stands, Raina loves hitting over midwicket, gets down on one knee and swipes that length ball for six
blocked towards backward point
length ball outside off, looks to cut that one but the ball goes over the bat

missed stumping, Raina was coming down the track, a yorker outside off foxes him, no way he was getting back if Sanga collected cleanly, but the Sri Lankan captain had got up too early to take the yorker
carved behind point off the backfoot for two more
angling it way outside off stump
short ball, much closer to off, Dhoni shuffles down the track and flat bats it to long-on
short and wide, Raina wanted to just dab it past short third man, he doesn't connect
that's Raina's half-century, punches the short of length delivery towards cover
'Two' is the call from Dhoni after he opens himself up to turn the ball from outside off to square leg
full ball is crunched down the track, crashes into the stumps at the non-striker's end and ricochets towards mid-off
back of a length and well outside off, driven uppishly by Raina, to the right of the bowler, who dives to try catch that one, it goes down to long-off for a single
full ball on offstump, swung away over midwicket for four, not a very good-looking stroke but effective
full and wide, squeezed out towards point
yorker on legstump, Dhoni gets the front leg out of the way, tips the ball in front of square leg
full and very wide, Raina goes down on one knee and swats that one towards deep point for a single
Malinga keeps going for the yorker, Dhoni punches this one down towards long-off for one more
Raina hits the stumps this time, a full-blooded swat down the ground to a full delivery, and this time they don't even get the single they got for the time Dhoni smashed the non-striker's wicket
grunts when he bowls the first ball, which is overpitched and too far outside off to be legal
full and well outside off again, Dhoni pre-meditates a paddle-sweep towards fine leg, he misses the ball
Perera is going to stick to a full-and-well-outside-off formula, Dhoni gets it towards extra cover, if the fielder had hit direct Dhoni was a goner
dot ball as Raina looks to dab an overpitched ball towards third man but misses
super over so far from Perera, driven down to extra cover for a single
low full toss on offstump, muscled towards deep midwicket, placement needed to be better from Dhoni, he gets only one from a poor delivery
slightly higher full toss on offstump, Raina swings it to long-on, Dhoni had sprinted the first in the hope of a second, but there isn't
Thushara starts off with a wide outside off stump
gets the boundary, not full enough from Thushara, Raina gets under it and swipes it towards deep midwicket for four
low full toss outside legstump, Raina looks to swat that one, gets a top-edge which ends up as a simple catch to deep midwicket, not the greatest of deliveries, but Sri Lanka won't complain
short ball on legstump, Dhoni pulls it towards deep backward square leg
a yorker first up for Yuvraj, on offstump, driven towards mid-on
another short ball, on middle and leg, Dhoni goes for a powerful pull, misses, hits him and rolls wide of the keeper
full ball on legstump, Yuvraj swings that one with the wind, but can't clear deep midwicket, Mahela is waiting on the boundary to collect that one
length ball outside off, swatted towards long-off for a single
low full toss just outside off, gets an inside-edge which goes past short fine leg for four, India need more of those
Malinga shows off his prowess at the death, another full swinging ball just outside off, Yusuf looks to clear long-on, looks back to see the ball in the keeper's hands
one more dot ball, full on middle, swung towards midwicket, no run

full and wide this time, Yusuf was backing away, he leans across at the last moment and throws his bat at it to get it towards third man, Yusuf wanted the second, third umpire is needed to confirm that he has made his ground
low full toss on offstump, punched to long-on, Dhoni charges back for the second
low full toss on middle and off, mistimed towards long-on for a single
another low full toss, just outside off, not too well hit from Yusuf, after he makes room he plays it inside out towards deep extra cover, evades three fielders who wer after it
slips in the bouncer after two full tosses, everyone knows that a good ploy against Yusuf, who leaves that one to the keeper
a yorker heading for legstump, Yusuf inside-edges it onto his pads
another yorker, just outside off, driven along the ground towards long-off
a full toss to finish, Yusuf looks to mow it over long-on, it goes a long way up but not far enough, Kapugedara takes the catch on the boundary
